text: Cwm Doethie – Mynydd Mallaen is a Site of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion and Carmarthenshire, mid Wales. Contained within it is the Allt Rhyd y Groes National nature reserve designated principally because of its sessile oak woodland clinging to near vertical cliffs of the River Doethie gorge. ==References== ==See also== * Mynydd Mallaen *List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion Category:Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion Category:National nature reserves in Wales
title: Cwm Doethie – Mynydd Mallaen
